document_data.mainbody: '''Storm domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with storm-related [[spell]]s and powers.
document_data.Powers: They gained a measure of resistance to electricity.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[entropic shield]]'', ''[[gust of wind]]'', and ''[[call lightning]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[sleet storm]]'', ''[[ice storm]]'', and ''[[summon monster vi]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[control weather]]'', ''[[whirlwind]]'', and ''[[storm of vengeance]]''.
